text: 👀Just watched the latest #WatchDSN video featuring @WalmartCanada's commitment to accessibility & affordability in healthcare! 💡💊🇨🇦 Alex Hurd, VP of Healthcare Services, highlights the differences between retail pharmacy in Canada & US, and how pharmacists can now diagnose & prescribe for minor ailments. 🤝 This move addresses access barriers, leverages the retail channel, and frees up the primary care system for more complex conditions! 💪🏼👍
